type: Type of losgistics object, e.g. air waybill, booking, etc
typeCode: Commonly useed codes for document type, e.g. jfwb, jfhl etc. Leave nlank if unknown
issuedBy: Internet of logistics code of issuing party.
key: JSON field name of code that identifies this logistics object, e.g. 'waybill number', 'UPID' etc.

payment-means.IDissuer: Issuer of the payment means codes - e.g. EDIFACT list 4461
payment-means.paymentTermIDissuer: Indicates the Payment Terms issuer. Ex. UNECE Recommendation 17 Code List.
payment-means.paymentTermID: Indicates the Payment Terms code, e.g. from the UNECE Recommendation 17 Code List

BankAccount.BankAccountNumber: Bank Identifier Code (BIC) or SWIFT code
BankAccount.BankAccountName: Bank Sort Number assigned to the branch of the bank
